CustomField.description: This field shows whichever Value was entered.
CustomField.formula: TRIM( IF(ValueCheckbox__c = TRUE, "TRUE", "") & TEXT(ValueCurrency__c) & TEXT(ValueDate__c) & TEXT(ValueDateTime__c) & ValueEmail__c & TEXT(ValueNumber__c) & TEXT(ValuePercent__c) & ValuePhone__c & ValueText__c & LEFT(ValueTextArea__c,255) & ValueURL__c & Street__c & " " & City__c & " " & State__c & " " & Country__c & " " & PostalCode__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows whichever Value was entered.
CustomField.label: Question Response
